title: Lead, the enduring metal
creator_credit: Lead Development Association and Stanley Schofield
brief_description: The uses of lead. History of the use of lead; lead ores; various methods of refining; uses of lead in buildings; lead paints; lead in chemical and electrical industries; lead type; lead bricks, trolleys and wall linings in dealing with radioactive materials. The advantages of lead in these various applications.
